医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现致命的 MRSA 肺炎如何抑制人体的抗菌活性研究人员研究了硫酸乙酰肝素 (HS) 脱落如何影响耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌 (MRSA) 肺炎中抗菌肽的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-uncover-how-deadly-MRSA-pneumonia-inhibits-bodys-antimicrobial-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-uncover-how-deadly-MRSA-pneumonia-inhibits-bodys-antimicrobial-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9886f2f-252c-493d-bd7b-c829d4fed178 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:46:00 -0500 Researchers uncover how deadly MRSA pneumonia inhibits body's antimicrobial activity

Absorbance 96 Automate 揭晓：全球首款用于实验室自动化的板载读板机为了通过集成微孔板读取彻底改变自动化实验室工作流程，Byonoy 自豪地推出了世界上第一台板载读板机 Absorbance 96 Automate。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Absorbance-96-Automate-revealed-The-worlde28099s-first-on-deck-plate-reader-for-laboratory-automation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Absorbance-96-Automate-revealed-The-worlde28099s-first-on-deck-plate-reader-for-laboratory-automation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913a97ec-7e58-473b-a925-76f7bcc21081 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:25:00 -0500 Absorbance 96 Automate revealed: The world’s first on-deck plate reader for laboratory automation
